statements: SELECT * FROM green_transport_incentives;
SELECT incentive_id, incentive_name, description FROM green_transport_incentives;
SELECT provider_name, start_date, end_date FROM green_transport_incentives;
SELECT * FROM green_transport_incentives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM green_transport_incentives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM green_transport_incentives ORDER BY provider_name DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT incentive_name, provider_name, description FROM green_transport_incentives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incentives FROM green_transport_incentives GROUP BY provider_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM green_transport_incentives WHERE provider_name LIKE 'ABC%' OR incentive_name LIKE '%Electric%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT incentive_name, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%W, %M %e, %Y') AS formatted_start_date FROM green_transport_incentives WHERE DATE(start_date) = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM green_transportation_incentives;
SELECT incentive_name, organization_name FROM green_transportation_incentives;
SELECT subsidy_program, government_agency FROM government_subsidies;
SELECT subsidy_program, description, eligibility_criteria FROM government_subsidies;
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_amount, start_date, end_date FROM green_transportation_incentives;
SELECT * FROM green_transportation_incentives;
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_amount FROM green_transportation_incentives WHERE organization_name ='Green Tech Inc';
SELECT incentive_id, organization_name, start_date FROM green_transportation_incentives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_subsidies WHERE government_agency ='Department of Transportation';
SELECT subsidy_id, subsidy_program, eligibility_criteria FROM government_subsidies WHERE subsidy_program = 'Electric Vehicle Subsidy';
SELECT * FROM green_transportation_incentives;
SELECT incentive_name, organization_name, amount FROM green_transportation_incentives WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM government_incentives ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT government_name, region, contact_email FROM government_incentives WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM organization_incentives LIMIT 5;
SELECT incentive_name, amount, organization_name FROM green_transportation_incentives WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT government_name, region, budget FROM government_incentives WHERE region = 'California' AND budget > 100000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT org_name, type, description FROM organization_incentives WHERE type = 'Financial' ORDER BY org_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM green_transportation_incentives WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' AND end_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT organization_name, amount, start_date, end_date FROM green_transportation_incentives WHERE amount BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, amount FROM incentives WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, start_date FROM incentives WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT name, amount FROM incentives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, name, country FROM organizations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT description FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA'
SELECT p.name, o.name AS organization_name FROM participants p JOIN organizations o ON p.organization_id = o.id
SELECT * FROM organization LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, type FROM organization ORDER BY type ASC;
SELECT name, headquarters_location FROM organization WHERE type='Green Energy' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM green_transportation_incentives WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT program_name, agency, amount FROM government_subsidies WHERE amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM green_transportation_incentives
SELECT name, amount FROM green_transportation_incentives ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT program_name, amount FROM government_subsidies WHERE amount > 5000
SELECT organization, amount_allocated FROM subsidy_distribution WHERE amount_allocated BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000 ORDER BY amount_allocated DESC
SELECT organization, type, headquarters_location FROM organization
